apple_vendor_description: This intimate emoji on Apple devices portrays two men sharing a tender kiss, with one depicted in a neutral skin tone and the other in a medium-dark skin tone, both rendered with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading and realistic lighting that adds a sense of depth and warmth. The smooth gradients and softly rounded edges emphasize the connection and affection between them. It’s a beautiful way to express romantic love, deep affection, or a passionate embrace between two men, perfectly captured with Apple’s inclusive and expressive design language.
